## You CAN do this at home
- Use the [webapp](presentation/src/pitch/img/looking_for_use_cases.png)
- Access our layers on [geoserver](https://geoserver-hachathon2025.lab.sspcloud.fr/geoserver)
- Predict on new Sentinel-2 images with the [API](https://hackathon-ntts-2025.lab.sspcloud.fr/docs) 
- Download the model on [Hugging Face](https://huggingface.co/InseeFrLab/hackathon-ntts-2025-segmentation/blob/main/README.md) to retrain and play 
- Use our complete stack: it is containerized
